skills.name: Serenity
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times and removes a beneficial effect with a 30% chance on each strike.

skills.name: Overwhelm
skills.description: Attacks all enemies and increases their cooldowns by 1 turn each with a 70% chance.

skills.name: Discernment (Passive)
skills.description: Decreases the chances of the allies being granted with weakening effects by 20% and increases the duration of the weakening effects that the allies, excluding those that are under inability effects, grant on the enemies by 1 turn each with the power of a piercing gaze. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Increase Cooltime
skill_effect.description: Puts the target's skill on cool down.

skill_effect.name: Increase Debuff Duration
skill_effect.description: Increases the duration of one or more debuffs on the enemy
